references.paper_title: Learning a deep convolutional network for image super-resolution
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in deep learning-based image super-resolution, establishing the effectiveness of CNNs for this task and influencing many subsequent studies.

references.paper_title: Ntire 2017 challenge on single image super-resolution: Dataset and study
references.reason: This paper introduced a widely used benchmark dataset for evaluating single image super-resolution algorithms, significantly influencing the field's evaluation and progress.

references.paper_title: Swinir: Image restoration using swin transformer
references.reason: This work demonstrated the power of Swin Transformers for image restoration tasks, advancing the state-of-the-art and influencing many subsequent works.

references.paper_title: Restormer: Efficient transformer for high-resolution image restoration
references.reason: This paper proposed Restormer, a highly efficient transformer-based architecture for image restoration, improving both efficiency and performance.
This work introduced a multi-stage progressive framework for image restoration, demonstrating the benefits of a multi-stage approach compared to single-stage methods.
